ingredients.item: 300g pack 20 essential Waitrose British Beef Meatballs

instructions.step: Toss the meatballs in the 5 spice. Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meatballs for 10 minutes on a medium heat until cooked through. Drain off excess oil, add the plum sauce and heat for 30 seconds. Remove and set aside.

Meanwhile, cook the noodles in boiling water for 4-5 minutes then drain. Add the vegetable stir-fry to the frying pan and cook for 5 minutes, then add the soy, honey and the noodles and cook for 1 minute. Serve topped with the meatballs and sauce.
